Nelson II Michigan Technological University Computer Science Graduate Student General Information: Office:         Fisher 227C Office Phone:   487-2839 Office Hours:   MWF 1-2pm Current Teaching Duties: CS122 - Introduction to Computer Science II _______________________________________________________________ Final Exam - Review topics... Chapt 1: Pointers Pointers ( operators *, &, ->, NULL ) Arrays ( implementation as pointers, and the [] operator ) Character Strings - arrays of characters ( NULL terminator ) Structures ( almost same as classes ) Chapt 2: Classes Constructors, Destructors, Copy constructors & the defaults Operator overloading - istream, ostream, friends, 'this' pointer Chapt 3: Templates Global template functions Template Classes Instantiation, and binding Chapt 4: Inheritance Public vs.
